description: Precise field positions extracted from Sample_certificate.png using 10 advanced computer vision methods. Consensus positions from 9 successful detection algorithms.

notes: Field positions extracted using 10 advanced computer vision techniques. 9 methods succeeded and were aggregated using median consensus. This provides robust, data-driven alignment based on the actual reference certificate.
